participant_1.background:
I'm a great cook, my friends and family love my food.
my mommy makes me a picnic lunch to eat outside.
I was a stay-at-home mom before I got my current job.
my sister is a guitarist.
i live in a small city.

participant_2.background:
I love the color green because it is calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with my toddler.
I've been saving up my allowance to buy a new bike.
My daily routine consists of working on my knitting projects and learning new techniques.
i have 8 brothers and we are close.
I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing okay. I'm a little tired but I'm excited to start the weekend.
Me too! I'm going to spend the weekend with my family.
That sounds nice. I'm going to work on my knitting projects.
That's cool! What are you knitting?
I'm knitting a sweater for my toddler.
That's so sweet! I'm sure he'll love it.
I hope so! I'm working on it in a green yarn because it's my favorite color.
Green is a great color. It's calming and peaceful.
Yes it is! It's the perfect color for a sweater.
I'm sure your toddler will love it.
Thanks! I hope so.
So what else do you like to do in your spare time?
I love to cook and bake. I'm a pretty good cook and I love to experiment with new recipes.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. I'm not as good at it as you are, but I'm learning.
Well you're definitely better than me at knitting!
Haha, I guess so! I've never tried knitting before.
You should try it! It's really fun and relaxing.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome!
